sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE167080 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , SCXPS_STD , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SCXPS_USE_AMT , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , BHDT , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #scxpsStd# , #famResnoEncCntn# , #clutSeptCd# , #scxpsUseAmt# , #scxpsStdDdcTrgtIndvAmt# , #bhdt# , #suptFmlyFnm# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE167080 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , SCXPS_STD=#scxpsStd# , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SCXPS_USE_AMT=#scxpsUseAmt# , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT=#scxpsStdDdcTrgtIndvAmt# , BHDT=#bhdt# , SUPT_FMLY_FNM=#suptFmlyFnm# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND SCXPS_STD=#scxpsStd# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE167080 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND SCXPS_STD=#scxpsStd# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , SCXPS_STD , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SCXPS_USE_AMT , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , BHDT , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167080 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND SCXPS_STD=#scxpsStd# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , SCXPS_STD , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SCXPS_USE_AMT , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , BHDT , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167080 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , SCXPS_STD DESC , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167080 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
